thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd take relationship to the next level and even the family is involved
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd take relationship to the next level and even the family is involved

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd take relationship to the next level and even the family is involved
text:
Selena Gomez and The Weeknd take relationship to the next level and even the family is involved The former Disney star has been spotted getting close to the The Weeknd Share The Weeknd and Selena Gomez now dating (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs   
Selena Gomez and The Weeknd are taking their relationship to the next level by making it Instagram official. 
Even though she risks making 'Taylor's squad' a bit awkward as he used to date Bella Hadid, Selena is taking things further with the R&B star. 
So much so, her cousin Priscilla DeLeon is also following him. Getting the family approval. 
Meanwhile, it was reported that Victoria's Secret Angel Bella thinks Selena is just using The Weeknd. (Photo: Splash News) Selena Gomez arrives at LAX Airport (Photo: Splash News) 
The 20-year-old model has reportedly warned her ex-boyfriend - real name Abel Tesfaye - about the 24-year-old singer's real intentions. 
A source said: "Bella has reached out to Abel a few times and told him Selena is using him. He thinks she’s just jealous and isn’t listening to her." 
Selena and The Weeknd's relationship is said to have come about after the pair started "working on very sexy music" together. 
An insider told Us Weekly magazine: "They started hanging as friends and it became romantic. They’re working on very sexy music, so it spilled over." Victoria's Secret Fashion Show (Photo: Rex Features) 
It comes after a source claimed Bella is "hurt" that The Weeknd moved on with the Come and Get It star. 
They said: "Bella and Abel’s split wasn’t dramatic, but of course she’s hurt and p****d that he’s moved on so quickly with Selena." Read More Selena Gomez dares to bare in sexy gold thong after she's spotted kissing The Weeknd Gigi and Bella let off steam after Selena snogs her ex (Photo: Splash News) 
But Selena isn't worried about hurting Bella as they've never been that close.An insider said previously: "Selena was always the girl who stayed away from a lot of the Taylor Swift crew, except for Taylor. She preferred to be one-on-one with Taylor and didn't like being a part of the whole squad thing." Bella Hadid (Photo: Rex) 
And another added: "Selena is not good friends with either Gigi or Bella. She knows them through other people, but they are just acquaintances. She is friendly with them, but not friends with them ... Selena and Gigi were never fond of each other, so Selena definitely doesn't have any stipulations about hooking up with or dating Bella's ex." 
Selena and and the Canadian singer were spotted kissing last week outside an Italian restaurant Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica. Like us on Facebook
